short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlighter tool for organizing guesses in the New York Time's game Connections

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Connections Highlighter is a handy tool for organizing your thoughts when playing New York Time's Connections. 

With Connections Highlighter, you can simply right-click on any tile to highlight it with other related tiles. Easily visualize your connection guesses before submitting your final answers.
